entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023
